dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: My lady seems to be in a... particular mood today...

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: It's all useless, isn't it...
Xi... Xichun?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: When these classes end and you guys all leave... I guess I'll be spending my days worried to death that an assassin could pop up out of nowhere and kill me at any moment.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Consumed by so much paranoia and worry that I'll start twitching at shadows cast from lamplights.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: So would it mean anything for me to... you know, prove to them that I deserve to be the Family Hierarch?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: I've spent my whole life trying to prove to everyone that I have the will and determination to become the Family Hierarch... and now I have to prove to everyone that I deserve to keep it?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: To those bastards whose only thought in their empty heads is how they can expand their rooms?
Mister Wei, have you ever heard of playing hooky before?

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: Playing... hooky? Is it a euphemism for... eliminating your enemies?
Well, I've rarely done it back when I was in school, but...
... when there's too much going on in your head, you just... skip school and go out to play.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: Oho...
Ah, I've only done it once myself, after a friend talked me into it.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: I agree... it seems that the time for my lady to clear her head... has come.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: Very well. Let us play... just one hooky...!

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... What are you guys doing?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: C'mon, let's get moving! I gotta prove myself, don't I? I gotta have those bastards' approval, don't I?
<She's in a really bad mood today, huh... >

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: My lady, have you visited the backyard by the <ruby=Snow Reed>Luxue</ruby> Hermitage(蘆雪庵) as of late?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... No, but I know what happened there. They threw in a few dead bodies from the massacre a decade ago, turned the pond foul, and decided to bury the whole thing.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: Indeed they did. The stench was so overwhelming and toxic that corpses of animals and plants could be seen floating on its surface, eventually turning the pond into a festering, black bog. People passing by had to plug their noses or risk passing out.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... So why even bring up something awful like that?

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: It seems that a tree had taken root there, my lady. Amidst all that rot.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: A willow.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: The willow tree reached deep into the pond with its roots, clearing it of the foul grease, cleansing the water...

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: ... and one day, we found it clear and glittering, thriving with other aquatic plants growing within.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: It's recovered from the rot, becoming a normal, clear pond surrounded by leaves and moss.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: Some months ago, they introduced a few carps in there, and...

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: ... when they checked again, they were just as vivacious as they were on their first day there.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: Would you like to pay the pond a visit, if it is all right with you?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: … Hmm.
Xichun didn't seem to quite buy his explanation, but she followed him anyway.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: You weren't kidding. I avoided this place for so long...

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... I never thought it could be this clean again.
I can hardly believe that this pond used to be a rotten bog. All that happened was that this tree happened to take root here...

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: What matters, my lady... is patience and determination.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: Of course, this place had slipped my mind then, as I was quite swamped with work, but...

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: ... the world has a stronger capacity to heal itself than one might imagine.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: Recovery will follow, as long as there is a steady root to rally around.
After a long break that seemed to freshen even our hearts...
Nice, you're making good progress.
Your form, the light in your eyes... I think you've certainly improved in all aspects.
I daresay you've had some change of heart, too?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Yeah. I do feel a tad more comfortable than I did before.
